file_content.text: Stop him! He's a killer!
Nice work! You Jedi are just as quick as they say.
Thanks for the assist, soldier!
Wow. We owe you one.
You ought to think about taking on some bounty hunting work. You can clearly handle yourself, and the credits are good.
You don't mind me saying so, a Jedi could make some serious credits picking up a bit of bounty work here and there. You should think about it.
I'm a soldier--I don't fight for credits.
I'm no merc.
I'm usually the one running, not the one chasing, if you get my meaning.
Me? Hunting criminals?
I wasn't aware bounty hunting was even allowed in the Republic.
Is it legal?
Jedi don't use their training for financial gain.
That isn't our way.
Hey, more power to you. I'm just saying, someone like you could definitely take down more than their share of scumbags.
Getting paid to take down criminals? Count me in.
Sounds good to me.
You decide you're interested, check in with the Bounty Brokers Association. They're running a special right now--more than enough bounty contracts to go around.
Yep! Some kind of new justice bill, politicians getting tough on crime... the usual story.
Just stop by the Bounty Brokers Association when you're ready to get started. There's a special going--more than enough bounty contracts to go around.
I'd better get our friend here turned in. Thanks again for the help.
Ha! Maybe some change would do you good, then!
